20110126020606.000|20110126020608.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS SAY VOTERS WANTED

20110126020612.000|20110126020614.000|CC1|JUST DIDN'T LIKE PARTISAN       
20110126020614.000|20110126020615.000|CC1|POLITICS AND THEY WANTED BOTH   
20110126020615.000|20110126020616.000|CC1|SIDES TO WORK TOGETHER.         
20110126020616.000|20110126020618.000|CC1|WHAT DO YOU THINK THE MESSAGE OF
20110126020618.000|20110126020619.000|CC1|THE MIDTERMS WAS?               
20110126020619.000|20110126020620.000|CC1|>> Greenfield: BECAUSE          
20110126020620.000|20110126020621.000|CC1|DIFFERENT PEOPLE CAN INTERPRET
